Texts.Chs: 啊，我明白我到底什么地方出错了！谢谢你，听着...我从我的朋友瓦格纳那里听说好像有谁在^green;弗雷亚三角洲II的实验室^reset;耗费了一生的时间在研究某种科技，你的科学已经证实了你现在是^orange;最顶尖的科学家^reset;，或许你可以去那里看看。坐标我已经传到你的S.A.I.L里了。
Texts.Eng: Ah, I see what I missed! Thanks! ...Listen...I heard from my friend, Wagner, who works in a ^green;remote lab on Delta Freya II^reset; that they made the discovery of a lifetime. ^orange;Your expertise^reset; could prove invaluable. Check your SAIL for the location.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;核能核心^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Nuclear Core^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我听说了不少关于你那^orange;富有创造力头脑^reset;的传闻。请为我在你的^orange;加工台^reset;里制作一个^orange;核能核心^reset;。我的操作流程好像不对，因为我自己尝试了很多遍都没法制造。
Texts.Eng: I've heard quite a bit about your ^orange;amazing mind^reset; from the others here. Could you perhaps craft a ^orange;Nuclear Core^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;? I can't seem to get it right!
